alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tishomingo, northeastern Alcorn, southern McNairy and southern Hardin Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 345 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Big Hill Pond State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Iuka, J P Coleman State Park, Pickwick Landing State Park, Burnsville, Glen, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Theo, Leedy, Shiloh, Farmington, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Doskie, Pebble Hill, Strickland and Hamburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
